title: Futsal Phenom in Afghanistan Is a Hero the Taliban Didnâ€™t Expect
summary_full: A triumph in indoor soccer has turned Alireza Ahmadi, 17, and other players from the Hazara minority, long marginalized in Afghanistan, into national heroes.
